name: Exotics
description: Exotics are one the most valuable Mineral harvested on Icarus and are a potential reward for completing certain Missions / Operations . They were the reason terraforming failed on Icarus, and now their unique properties are sought after by the various Factions seeking to exploit Icarus.
harvested_from: any mission except Potshot: Training; the yield per vein
where they are located vary per mission
